name: Customer_Sales Team
script:
# 获取当前用户文档对象和角色
user_doc = frappe.get_doc('User', frappe.user)

# 检查用户是否拥有任何豁免角色
has_special_role = any(
    role.role in {'System Manager', 'Sales Master', 'Sales Master Manager'}
    for role in user_doc.roles
)

# 如果用户没有豁免角色，进行权限过滤
if not has_special_role:
    # 使用 SQL 查询直接构造过滤条件
    conditions = """
    name IN (
        SELECT cust.name
        FROM `tabCustomer` cust
        INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` team ON cust.name = team.parent
        INNER JOIN `tabSales Person` person ON team.sales_person = person.name
        INNER JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON person.employee = emp.name
        WHERE emp.user_id = '%s'
    )
    """ % frappe.user
else:
    conditions = None  # 拥有豁免角色的用户没有限制
